name: Ministerio Simulator
description:
A nerve racking bureaucracy survival horror. Join your friends to keep the civilian population happy by filing forms and stamping documents! EXCITING!

Supports local multiplayer up to 4 players. Controller REQUIRED!

How To play:

Deliver the requested forms that appear on top of the string to the front desk located in the lower left area of the map. Pick up the required form, stamp and copy, the order of stamps or copy does not matter.

Controls (based on Xbox Controller)

Left Analog - Move

A button - Interact (Take forms, stamp forms, shred forms, copy forms, etc forms)

B button - Drop form (but why would you?)

Start - Join in or drop out of the game (spam the button for a psychdelic ghostly experience)

Credits:

Guillermo Badaracco - 2D Art/Game Design

Emiliano Delgado - 2D Art

Diego Pazos - 3D Art

Manuel de Armas - 3D Art/Production

Federico Montoli - Programming

Juan Rodriguez - Programming

This was made in 30 something hours during the Uruguay Winter Game Jam 2017
